title: MsRIXI
author: MsRIXI
content: I will sell my verified payoneer account. Price - $40

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: MsRIXI on August 02, 2023, 07:50:11 AMI will sell my verified payoneer account. Price - $40Anyone who wants to buy the account keep in mind that 1. The account can be recovered2. A certain number of dollars should be received befor enqbling receive and send money from payoneer 3. Payoneer may ask for the source of the fund in that case you hace to share business details or link of freelancer. The source or profile of freelancer should be match with the account4. Any time may ask for kyc verification in this case they may ask for video, bank statement as well as payment proof
